word:
Care of the Respiratory Organs. 
Exercise. 
     731. Morning exercise, walking in the free, invigorating air of heaven, or cultivating flowers, small 
                                                                           177
fruits, and vegetables, is necessary to a healthful circulation of the blood. It is the surest safeguard against colds, coughs, congestion of the brain, inflammation of the liver, the kidneys, and the lungs, and a hundred other diseases.--H. R.
